summary: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.
cast: John Wayne|Kirk Douglas|Patricia Neal|Tom Tryon|Paula Prentiss|Brandon De Wilde|Jill Haworth|Dana Andrews|Stanley Holloway|Burgess Meredith|Franchot Tone|Patrick O'Neal|Carroll O'Connor|Slim Pickens|James Mitchum|George Kennedy|Bruce Cabot|Barbara Bouchet|Tod Andrews|Larry Hagman|Stewart Moss|Richard LePore|Chet Stratton|Soo Yong|Dort Clark|Phil Mattingly|Henry Fonda|Yankee Chang|Fritz Ford|Christopher George|Jerry Goldsmith|Hal Needham|Hugh O'Brian
title: Primera victoria
